channel.title: WDEVN - All about the living World - from Asia
channel.description: All about the living world - from Asia. WDEVN is audiocasting and videocasting from Taipei, Taiwan creating productions documenting life in the region. A wide range of topics are covered which include, but not limited to, the arts, Chinese culture, discussions, interviews, local media, nightlife, religion, trends and travel. New programs, functions and feature are added weekly. Comments and requests from listeners and viewers via email or audio and video files are accepted electronically as well.
channel.itunes:subtitle: All about the living world - from Asia. WDEVN is an audiocast and videocast site in Taipei, Taiwan focusing on life in
channel.itunes:summary: WDEVN post and streams media files about life in Taiwan and the Asia region.
channel.itunes:keywords: Taiwan China Chinese Travel Movies language Taiwanese Travel Hong Kong
